Text: Why don't just put all screensavers in one torrent pack and upload it? rather than doing it ONE BY ONE in order to get attention like an EMO girl on MYSPACE????

I'm sorry for the strong language in my previous comment but you should really consider going to deviantart website, because your target audience surfs there. Here on TPB, people don't come with primary objective of downloading some screensaver, and nor do people enjoy 10 screensaver torrents per page on application section here.

I'm promoting my screensavers, one by one, this is a free site and i'm not breaking any rules.

Is better to me and for the users to choose what screensaver download viewing the picture in the torrent post.
